files.Title: FlowRight.Core.Extensions.ResultAsyncExtensions
files.Summary: Provides async-friendly extension methods for the Result and Result<T> types, enabling seamless composition of asynchronous operations with the Result pattern.

files.Title: FlowRight.Core.Results.IResult<T>
files.Summary: Represents a Result pattern implementation that can contain a typed success value, providing pattern matching and functional programming capabilities.

files.Title: FlowRight.Core.Results.IResult
files.Summary: Represents the basic contract for Result pattern implementations, providing access to success/failure state and error information without exposing the success value.

files.Title: FlowRight.Core.Results.IResultError<T>
files.Summary: Provides access to error messages from result operations, supporting covariant access to error information.

files.Title: FlowRight.Core.Results.Result<T>
files.Summary: Provides a generic Result implementation that represents the outcome of operations that return a typed value, supporting both success and failure states with comprehensive error handling.

files.Title: FlowRight.Core.Results.Result
files.Summary: Provides a non-generic Result implementation that represents the outcome of operations that don't return a value, supporting both success and failure states with detailed error information.

files.Title: FlowRight.Core.Results.ResultFailureType
files.Summary: Specifies the specific type of failure that occurred in a result operation, providing detailed categorization for different error scenarios and enabling appropriate error handling strategies.

files.Title: FlowRight.Core.Results.ResultType
files.Summary: Specifies the general category or severity level of a result, providing high-level classification for success states and various types of informational or error conditions.

files.Title: FlowRight.Core.Serialization.ResultJsonConverter
files.Summary: Provides custom JSON serialization and deserialization for instances.

files.Title: FlowRight.Core.Serialization.ResultTJsonConverter<T>
files.Summary: Provides custom JSON serialization and deserialization for instances.

files.Title: FlowRight.Http.Extensions.HttpResponseMessageExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for converting HTTP response messages to Result types.

files.Title: FlowRight.Http.Models.ContentTypeInfo
files.Summary: Represents parsed content type information including media type, charset, and parameters.

files.Title: FlowRight.Http.Models.ValidationProblemJsonSerializerContext
files.Summary: Provides JSON serialization context for to enable AOT compilation.

files.Title: FlowRight.Http.Models.ValidationProblemResponse
files.Summary: Represents a validation problem response that follows RFC 7807 Problem Details specification and contains field-specific error messages.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Builders.ValidationBuilder<T>
files.Summary: A fluent validation builder that integrates with the Result<T> pattern to provide comprehensive validation capabilities with automatic error aggregation and Result<T> composition support.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Context.IValidationContext
files.Summary: Provides validation context for complex validation scenarios, enabling access to parent objects, services, custom data storage, and hierarchical validation support.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Context.ValidationContext
files.Summary: Concrete implementation of IValidationContext that provides comprehensive validation context for complex validation scenarios with object access, service integration, custom data storage, and hierarchical validation support.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.AlphaNumericDashRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value contains only alphanumeric characters and dashes.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.AlphaNumericRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value contains only alphanumeric characters.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.AlphaNumericSpaceRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value contains only alphanumeric characters and spaces.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.AlphaRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value contains only alphabetic characters.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.BetweenRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a value is between two bounds (inclusive). This is an alias for InclusiveBetweenRule for backward compatibility and intuitive naming.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.ContainsItemRule<TItem>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a collection contains a specific item.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.ContainsRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value contains a specified substring.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.CountRule<TItem>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a collection contains an exact number of items.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.CreditCardRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that validates credit card numbers using the Luhn algorithm.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.EachRule<TItem>
files.Summary: A validation rule that validates each item in a collection using a nested validation rule.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.EmailRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value is a valid email address format.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.EmptyRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a value is empty or in its default state.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.EndsWithRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value ends with a specified suffix.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.EqualRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a value is equal to a specified comparison value.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.EqualToRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value is equal to a specific expected value.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.ExactLengthRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string has an exact specified length.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.ExclusiveBetweenRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a value is between two bounds (exclusive).

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.GreaterThanOrEqualToRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a value is greater than or equal to a specified comparison value.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.GreaterThanRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a value is greater than a specified comparison value.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.GuidNonZeroTimestampRule
files.Summary: Validation rule that ensures a GUID has non-zero timestamp bits, indicating it was not created at epoch time. This can help identify potentially invalid or placeholder GUIDs that may have been generated incorrectly.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.GuidNotEmptyRule
files.Summary: Validation rule that ensures a GUID is not the empty GUID (00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000). This provides a more semantic alternative to NotEqual(Guid.Empty) for GUID-specific validation.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.GuidValidFormatRule
files.Summary: Validation rule that ensures a GUID follows the standard hyphenated format (8-4-4-4-12 characters). This validates the string representation of the GUID is properly formatted.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.IAsyncContextAwareRule<T>
files.Summary: Defines an asynchronous validation rule that can access validation context for complex validation scenarios. This interface enables context-aware validation with async operations such as database lookups or web service calls.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.IContextAwareRule<T>
files.Summary: Defines a validation rule that can access validation context for complex validation scenarios. This interface extends the basic IRule functionality to enable context-aware validation.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.IRule<T>
files.Summary: Defines a validation rule that can be applied to values of type T, providing error messages when validation fails.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.InclusiveBetweenRule<TNumeric>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a numeric value is between two bounds (inclusive).

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.InclusiveBetweenRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures an integer value is between two bounds (inclusive).

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.LengthRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string length is within specified bounds.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.LessThanOrEqualToRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a value is less than or equal to a specified comparison value.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.LessThanRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a value is less than a specified comparison value.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.LowerCaseRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value is in lowercase.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.MatchesRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value matches a specified regular expression pattern.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.MaxCountRule<TItem>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a collection contains at most a specified number of items.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.MaxLengthRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string does not exceed a specified maximum length.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.MinCountRule<TItem>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a collection contains at least a specified number of items.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.MinLengthRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string meets a minimum length requirement.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.MustAsyncContextAwareRule<T>
files.Summary: An asynchronous context-aware validation rule that applies a custom condition function with access to validation context. This rule enables complex validation scenarios that require async operations and access to root objects, services, or custom data.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.MustContextAwareRule<T>
files.Summary: A context-aware validation rule that applies a custom condition function with access to validation context. This rule enables complex validation scenarios that require access to root objects, services, or custom data.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.MustRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that applies a custom condition function to validate values.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.NegativeRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a numeric value is negative (less than zero).

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.NotEmptyRule<T>
files.Summary: Validation rule that ensures a value is not considered "empty" according to type-specific logic. Handles nulls, empty strings, default values, empty GUIDs, and empty collections.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.NotEqualRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a value is not equal to a specified comparison value.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.NotNullRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a value is not null.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.NullRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a value is null.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.PhoneRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that validates phone numbers in various common formats.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.PositiveRule<T>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a numeric value is positive (greater than zero).

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.PostalCodeRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that validates postal codes for various countries (US ZIP, Canadian postal, UK postal codes).

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.PrecisionScaleRule<TNumeric>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a numeric value meets precision and scale requirements.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.SpecificGuidValueRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a GUID value matches a specific expected GUID.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.StartsWithRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value starts with a specified prefix.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.UniqueRule<TItem>
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures all items in a collection are unique.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.UpperCaseRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value is in uppercase.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.UrlRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that ensures a string value is a valid URL format.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Rules.ValidGuidFormatRule
files.Summary: A validation rule that validates a string is in a proper GUID format.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Validators.EnumerablePropertyValidator<T, TItem>
files.Summary: Provides validation rules for enumerable/collection properties with fluent configuration.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Validators.GenericPropertyValidator<T, TProp>
files.Summary: Property validator for generic types that provides basic validation operations.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Validators.GuidPropertyValidator<T>
files.Summary: Provides fluent validation rules specifically designed for GUID properties, offering comprehensive GUID-specific validation capabilities including empty GUID checks, version validation, and format validation.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Validators.NumericPropertyValidator<T, TNumeric>
files.Summary: Provides fluent validation rules specifically designed for numeric properties, offering comprehensive numeric comparison and range validation capabilities for any type implementing INumber<T>.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Validators.PropertyValidator<T, TProp, TRule>
files.Summary: Abstract base class for all property validators, providing core validation functionality and fluent interface patterns for building complex validation rules. This class enables type-safe validation chaining and integration with the ValidationBuilder<T> framework.

files.Title: FlowRight.Validation.Validators.StringPropertyValidator<T>
files.Summary: Provides fluent validation rules specifically designed for string properties, offering comprehensive string-specific validation capabilities including length checks, pattern matching, and email validation.
